title: Checking the Fuse
summary: The lights are back on, but the wiring is still humming ominously.
description: That surge didn't just trip a breaker; it fried something deeper in the wall. Ollie wants you to check the sub-panel outside before the whole block goes dark again.
flavor: It smells like ozone and bad decisions.

stages.title: Inspect the Sub-Panel
stages.description: Head outside and check the sub-panel on the exterior wall.

stages.title: Replace the Fuse
stages.description: Swap out the blown fuse with a spare from the toolbox.

tasks.text: Find a spare fuse in the garage toolbox.
Install the new fuse in the sub-panel.
